ayas.text: alif lām rā ۚ kitābun anzalnāhu ilayka litukhrijan nāsa minaẓ ẓulumāti ilan nūri bi-idhni rabbihim ilā ṣirāṭil `azīzil ḥamīd
allāhil ladhī lahu mā fis samāwāti wa mā fil-arḍ ۗ wawaylul lilkāfirīna min `adhābin shadīd
alladhīna yastaḥibbūnal ḥayātad dunyā `alal-ākhirati wayaṣuddūna `an sabīlillāhi wayabghūnahā `iwajā ۚ ulā-ika fī ḍalālin ba`īd
wa mā arsalnā min rasūlin illā bilisāni qawmihi liyubayyina lahum ۖ fayuḍillullāhu man yashā-u wayahdī man yashā-u ۚ wahuwal `azīzul ḥakīm
walaqad arsalnā mūsā bi-āyātinā an akhrij qawmaka minaẓ ẓulumāti ilan nūri wadhakkirhum bi-ayyāmillāh ۚ inna fī dhālika la-āyātin likulli ṣabbārin shakūr

wa idh qāla mūsā liqawmihidh-kurū ni`matallāhi `alaykum idh anjākum min āli fir`awna yasūmūnakum sū al `adhābi wayudhabbiḥūna abnā-akum wayastaḥyūna nisā-akum ۚ wafī dhālikum balā-un min rabbikum `aẓīm
wa idh ta-adhhana rabbukum la-in shakartum la-azīdannakum ۖ wala-in kafartum inna `adhābī lashadīd
waqāla mūsā in takfurū antum wa man fil-arḍi jamī`an fa-innallāha laghaniyyun ḥamīd

alam ya-tikum naba-ul ladhīna min qablikum qawmi nūḥin wa`ādin wathamūd ۛ wal ladhīna min ba`dihim ۛ lā ya`lamuhum illallāh ۚ jā-at hum rusuluhum bil bayyināti faraddū aydiyahum fī afwāhihim waqālū innā kafarnā bimā ursiltum bihi wa innā lafī shakkin mimmā tad`ūnanā ilayhi murīb

qālat rusuluhum afillāhi shakkun fāṭiris samāwāti wal-arḍ ۖ yad`ūkum liyaghfira lakum min dhunūbikum wayu-akhhirakum ilā ajalin musammā ۚ qālū in antum illā basharun mithlunā turīdūna an taṣuddūnā `ammā kāna ya`budu ābā-unā fa-tūnā bisulṭānin mubīn

qālat lahum rusuluhum in naḥnu illā basharun mithlukum walākinnallāha yamunnu `alā man yashā-u min `ibādih ۖ wa mā kāna lanā an na-tiyakum bisulṭānin illā bi-idhnillāh ۚ wa`alallāhi falyatawakkalil mu-minūn
wa mā lanā allā natawakkala `alallāhi waqad hadānā subulanā ۚ walanaṣbiranna `alā mā ādhaytumūnā ۚ wa`alallāhi falyatawakkalil mutawakkilūn
waqālal ladhīna kafarū lirusulihim lanukhrijannakum min arḍinā aw lata`ūdunna fī millatinā ۖ fa-awḥā ilayhim rabbuhum lanuhlikannaẓ ẓālimīn
walanuskinannakumul-arḍa min ba`dihim ۚ dhālika liman khāfa maqāmī wakhāfa wa`īd
wastaftaḥū wakhāba kullu jabbārin `anīd
min warā-ihi jahannamu wayusqā min mā-in ṣadīd
yatajarra`uhu walā yakādu yusīghuhu waya-tīhil mawtu min kulli makānin wa mā huwa bimayyit ۖ wa min warā-ihi `adhābun ghalīẓ
mathalul ladhīna kafarū birabbihim ۖ a`māluhum karamādinish-taddat bihir rīḥu fī yawmin `āṣif ۖ lā yaqdirūna mimmā kasabū `alā shay-ī ۚ dhālika huwaḍ ḍalālul ba`īd
alam tara annallāha khalaqas samāwāti wal-arḍa bil ḥaqq ۚ in yasha-yudh-hibkum waya-ti bikhalqin jadīd
wa mā dhālika `alallāhi bi`azīz

wabarazū lillāhi jamī`an faqālaḍ ḍu`afā-u lilladhīnas-takbarū innā kunnā lakum taba`an fahal antum mughnūna `annā min `adhābillāhi min shay-ī ۚ qālū law hadānallāhu lahadaynākum ۖ sawā-un `alaynā ajazi`nā am ṣabarnā mā lanā min maḥīṣ

waqālash shayṭānu lammā quḍiyal-amru innallāha wa`adakum wa`dal ḥaqqi wawa`adtukum fa-akhlaftukum ۖ wa mā kāna liya `alaykum min sulṭānin illā an da`awtukum fastajabtum lī ۖ falā talūmūnī walūmū anfusakum ۖ mā ana bimuṣrikhikum wa mā antum bimuṣrikhiyy ۖ innī kafartu bimā ashraktumūni min qabl ۗ innaẓ ẓālimīna lahum `adhābun alīm
wa-udkhilal ladhīna āmanū wa`amiluṣ ṣāliḥāti jannātin tajrī min taḥtihal-anhāru khālidīna fīhā bi-idhni rabbihim ۖ taḥiyyatuhum fīhā salām
alam tara kayfa ḍaraballāhu mathalan kalimatan ṭayyibatan kashajaratin ṭayyibatin aṣluhā thābitun wafar`uhā fis samā-i
tu-tī ukulahā kulla ḥīnin bi-idhni rabbihā ۗ wayaḍribullāhul-amthāla linnāsi la`allahum yatadhakkarūn
wa mathalu kalimatin khabīthatin kashajaratin khabīthatinij-tuthhat min fawqil-arḍi mā lahā min qarār
yuthabbitullāhul ladhīna āmanū bil qawlith thābiti fil ḥayātid dunyā wafil-ākhirah ۖ wayuḍillullāhuẓ ẓālimīn ۚ wayaf`alullāhu mā yashā-u
alam tara ilal ladhīna baddalū ni`matallāhi kufran wa-aḥallū qawmahum dāral bawār
jahannama yaṣlawnahā ۖ wabi-sal qarār
waja`alū lillāhi andādal liyuḍillū `an sabīlih ۗ qul tamatta`ū fa-inna maṣīrakum ilan nār
qul li`ibādiyal ladhīna āmanū yuqīmuṣ ṣalāta wayunfiqū mimmā razaqnāhum sirran wa`alāniyatan min qabli an ya-tiya yawmul lā bay`un fīhi walā khilāl
allāhul ladhī khalaqas samāwāti wal-arḍa wa-anzala minas samā-i mā-an fa-akhraja bihi minath thamarāti rizqal lakum ۖ wasakhhara lakumul fulka litajriya fil baḥri bi-amrih ۖ wasakhhara lakumul-anhār
wasakhhara lakumush shamsa wal qamara dā-ibayn ۖ wasakhhara lakumul layla wan nahār
wa-ātākum min kulli mā sa-altumūh ۚ wa in ta`uddū ni`matallāhi lā tuḥṣūhā ۗ innal-insāna laẓalūmun kaffār
wa idh qāla ibrāhīmu rabbij-`al hādhal balada āminan wajnubnī wabaniyya an na`budal-aṣnām
rabbi innahunna aḍlalna kathīran minan nās ۖ faman tabi`anī fa-innahu minnī ۖ wa man `aṣānī fa-innaka ghafūrun raḥīm

rabbanā innī askantu min dhurriyyatī biwādin ghayri dhī zar`in `inda baytikal muḥarrami rabbanā liyuqīmuṣ ṣalāta faj`al af-idatan minan nāsi tahwy ilayhim warzuqhum minath thamarāti la`allahum yashkurūn
rabbanā innaka ta`lamu mā nukhfī wa mā nu`lin ۗ wa mā yakhfā `alallāhi min shay-in fil-arḍi walā fis samā-i
al-ḥamdu lillāhil ladhī wahaba lī `alal-kibari ismā`īla wa is-ḥāq ۚ inna rabbī lasamī`ud du`ā-i
rabbij-`alnī muqīmaṣ ṣalāti wa min dhurriyyatī ۚ rabbanā wataqabbal du`ā-i
rabbanagh-fir lī waliwālidayya walil-mu-minīna yawma yaqūmul ḥisāb
walā taḥsabannallāha ghāfilan `ammā ya`maluẓ ẓālimūn ۚ innamā yu-akhhiruhum liyawmin tashkhaṣu fīhil-abṣār
muhṭi`īna muqni`ī ru-ūsihim lā yartaddu ilayhim ṭarfuhum ۖ wa-af-idatuhum hawā-u
wa-andhirin nāsa yawma ya-tīhimul `adhābu fayaqūlul ladhīna ẓalamū rabbanā akhhirnā ilā ajalin qarībin nujib da`wataka wanattabi`ir rusul ۗ awalam takūnū aqsamtum min qablu mā lakum min zawāl
wasakantum fī masākinil ladhīna ẓalamū anfusahum watabayyana lakum kayfa fa`alnā bihim waḍarabnā lakumul-amthāl
waqad makarū makrahum wa`indallāhi makruhum wa in kāna makruhum litazūla minhul jibāl
falā taḥsabannallāha mukhlifa wa`dihi rusulah ۗ innallāha `azīzun dhun-tiqām
yawma tubaddalul-arḍu ghayral-arḍi was samāwāt ۖ wabarazū lillāhil wāḥidil qahhār
wataral mujrimīna yawma-idhin muqarranīna fil-aṣfād
sarābīluhum min qaṭirānin wataghshā wujūhahumun nār
liyajziyallāhu kulla nafsin mā kasabat ۚ innallāha sarī`ul ḥisāb
hādhā balāghul linnāsi waliyundharū bihi waliya`lamū annamā huwa ilāhun wāḥidun waliyadhhakkara ulul-albāb
